query: SELECT f.id, f.filename, f.url, f.fileKey, f.fileSize, f.mimeType, f.createdAt FROM files f WHERE f.filename LIKE '%PXL_2026%' OR f.mimeType LIKE 'video/%' ORDER BY f.id DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nXHNKWaT6KdAop.2df66c7cd877 --database SaoZcd7riW2zyxorRaqL7d --execute SELECT f.id, f.filename, f.url, f.fileKey, f.fileSize, f.mimeType, f.createdAt FROM files f WHERE f.filename LIKE '%PXL_2026%' OR f.mimeType LIKE 'video/%' ORDER BY f.id DESC LIMIT 5;
